alert.note: Alert for Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sussex and southwestern Kent Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andrewsville, or 16 miles northwest of Georgetown, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milford, Harrington, Bridgeville, Ellendale, Andrewsville, Felton, Greenwood, Houston, Farmington and Riverview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
